description: Situated on the lakefront with beautiful views from its terrace, this restaurant focuses on freshwater fish, while also serving a selection of classic regional specialities. Careful attention is paid to natural ingredients, with vegetarian options also available. An elegant restaurant which belies its description as a “trattoria”.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
